mapper.insert:
insert into p2p_cust_location_log (CUST_ID, IP, MOBILE_SIGN, MOBILE_OS, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATIONAL, CITY_CODE, DEVICE_MODEL, DEVICE_VERSION, DEVICE_PHONE_NUM, DEVICE_SIM, DEVICE_MAC, APP_VERSION, CREATE_TIME) values
(#{item.custId}, NULL, #{item.mobileSign}, 'ANDROID', #{item.longitude}, #{item.latitude}, '上海市黄浦区建德路9号', #{item.cityCode}, 'ZTE Grand S II LTE', '4.3 , 18', 'Unknown', '89860114831007854369', #{item.deviceMac}, '2.1.3', #{item.createTime})

update p2p_cust_location_log
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MOBILE_OS = #{mobileOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
